name: Keep Warm (GrapefruitChili, Dannan, Marcus Walker, BryanO, JasonK_Music, Tzapora)
name_original: Keep Warm (GrapefruitChili, Dannan, Marcus Walker, BryanO, JasonK_Music, Tzapora)
description:
Description

Escape the oncoming fire that is causing the space station to crumble into space. Be sure to avoid the metal crates that will slow you down and staying warm in the ever encompassing coldness of space. Use fire to speed yourself up and run further, just be careful though not to get too hot by spreading your fire to any cardboard boxes you see lying around.

Controls

  • Space to jump
  • Enter to punch doors down (useful when you can't crash through it without being on fire)

Credit

  • BryanO - Programming (@BryanOArt)
  • Dannan Vazquez - Programming (@Dannan)
  • PetuhBreadv - Art 3D
  • Tzapora - Art 2D
  • C137 - Audio SFX
  • Jason Kelliher - Audio Composer
  • GrapefruitChili - Producer and Designer (@GentleElfGames)
